@jona +10mins Thanks!

Hi Una,

We have created a shortcode that you could use if you want to add a social share. Please see the attached. 
Let me know if this works for you?

OMG you guys are just the BEST!!! Thank you so much!!!!! ☺

I was so baffled as there used to be a button on the webpage when building that said 'embed hubspot form' which we then could scroll down and select the form we had... too easy... but im just so happy its working now, I'll work out how to do it again from your instructions... ☺

One more question (we're going live tomorrow)

I added our social buttons to some of our posts as a test, but these just open our social pages, they're not the sharing buttons... where do I go to add these if we want to encourage people to share our posts?



Not as urgent but if you had any thoughts that would be great!!

Cheers

Una

@jona +10mins Thanks!

Hi Una,

We made some tweaks on the english page form it should be working fine now. The form on the dutch site seems to be working fine on my end. Please see the attached.

Regarding on adding a hubspot form.
- You need to go to Hubspot > Forms
- Search the form title
- Click "Copy Shortcode" and paste it on the content of the page
Let us know if you need more info on adding the hubspot. 

Hope this make sense. Cheers!

The English page now sits under the name 'New Future of Work' ... https://www.veldhoencompany.com/en/new-future-of-work/?preview_id=6525&preview_nonce=427e69c3df&_thumbnail_id=-1&preview=true

Cheers

Una

Una Mapes

London | http://www.veldhoencompany.com/

We've been working on it today and getting the videos ready for uploading... but have noticed something has happened to our Hubspot connection.

The form on the dutch page isn't loading, and I cant link another form to the English page.. The option to add a Hubspot form has disappeared!! It used to be at the top of the page! Do you know whats happened?

We need the data capture for both markets... help!



Cheers

Una

Hi Una,

Sure, we have duplicated the "NL - work from home page". I have attached a screenshot where you can edit the image.
Click the pencil icon beside the page section (in a red background).

Regarding the SEO, if you are adding more content, it is actually a benefit, as Google will see the new content as you enhancing the subject matter. It's best practice not to copy and paste the exact same copy on multiple pages, BUT, you can certainly paraphrase and expand on other content and link to it internally. Google likes this. I hope that makes sense?
Logged 5mins to Harvest. 3/23/20

Fab - thanks Joel!!

Are you able to replicate this for our English version of the site?

We'd like to use a different image for the English version, can you tell me where I can change that?

Also, we're going to be adding lots of content for both over the coming weeks.. in terms of customer experience, are we creating a rod for our own back? Are we damaging the SEO of the site? Should we try to link the stories back to our main news pages?? I'm getting concerned we're going to let this take over the site, and I don't want that to happen...

Cheers

Una

Thanks so much Joel!

I've been working on updating it for the Dutch team but need more input from them re more copy and their thoughts. As each box now opens to another page we need for text to support these.

In the mean-time I was thinking that maybe the landing page needs a banner to differentiate it from the rest of the site.

I've attached an example here of a quick mock-up as an idea. But what do you guys think? Bearing in mind the customer experience... how does this look with the rest of the site, does it fit? Would be great to get your thoughts.

Also where we have the images with the little white box and button below.. could we have the white part changed into grey so it blends with the rest of the background?

Cheers

Una

Hi Una,

We have duplicated the previous page and made some change on it. 
https://www.veldhoencompany.com/nl/thuiswerken-omdat-het-moet-opent-nieuwe-deuren/

To add a new covid posts 
- Go to this link(make sure to select language Dutch) https://www.veldhoencompany.com/wp-admin/edit.php
- You can clone a posts or create a new one. 
- Make sure to set the posts category to "covid-19"

Let us know if this works for you?

Perfect!

Please record your time as a note to Jona as well. Cheers
